Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Calvia (Palmanova), Apartamentos Playas Cas Saboners is convenient to Palma Nova Beach and Golf Fantasia. This family-friendly apartment is within close proximity of Pirates Adventure Show and Western Water Park.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 130 guestrooms, featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and stovetops. Rooms have private furnished balconies or patios. 22-inch flat-screen televisions are provided, with satellite programming available. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and microwaves.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities including a seasonal outdoor pool and bicycles to rent. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Grab a bite from a snack bar/deli serving guests of Apartamentos Playas Cas Saboners. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite from a snack bar/deli serving guests of Apartamentos Playas Cas Saboners. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Located in Calvia (Palmanova), Apartamentos Playas Cas Saboners is convenient to Palma Nova Beach and Golf Fantasia. This family-friendly apartment is within close proximity of Pirates Adventure Show and Western Water Park.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Palma Nova Beach - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Golf Fantasia - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Pirates Adventure Show - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Western Water Park - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Poniente Golf Club - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Marineland Mallorca - 3.1 km / 2 mi
Puerto Portals Marina - 3.3 km / 2 mi
Mago Beach - 4.5 km / 2.8 mi
Santa Ponsa Beach - 4.7 km / 2.9 mi
Real Golf Bendinat - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi
Port of Adriano - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi
Cala Mayor Beach - 7.3 km / 4.6 mi
Marivent Palace - 7.6 km / 4.7 mi
San Carlos Castle - 8.3 km / 5.1 mi
Mallorca Casino - 8.4 km / 5.2 mi

The preferred airport for Apartamentos Playas Cas Saboners is Palma de Mallorca (PMI) - 17.2 km / 10.7 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Playas Ca's Saboners - Apartment is Palma de Mallorca (PMI) - 17.3 km / 10.8 mi.
